content: following replacements * super bulky 6 weight yarn in 4 colors hamburger/bun * yarn a tan example uses premier parfait chunky almond butter * yarn b white example uses premier parfait chunky cream * yarn c beige example uses premier parfait chunky cream * yarn d brown example uses premier parfait chunky chocolate * optional super bulky 6 weight yarn in 6 colors fixins * yarn e cheese/tomato yellow example uses premier parfait chunky summer squash * yarn f lettuce green example uses limited edition premier parfait chunky seaweed salad recommended replacement is premier parfait chunky kelly green * yarn g tomato pink/orange example uses premier parfait chunky coral * yarn h tomato red example uses premier parfait chunky poppy * yarn i onion white example uses premier parfait chunky white * yarn j onion purple example uses premier parfait chunky orchid * 14mm black safety eyes x2 * pink yarn example uses premier parfait chunky pink lemonade * black embroidery floss doubled **terminology ** this free crochet hamburger amigurumi pattern uses english us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the span of 2 stitches also known as a decrease * popcorn = small popcorn∗ * spsc = spike stitch∗ please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch ∗please read through the special instructions for these stitches before beginning as they may be unique for this free crochet hamburger amigurumi pattern **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https
